summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Unknown. 판결일: 2014-05-20. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ernestine Rencher, and Benjamin Phillips, Harold Minor, Daniel C. Parsons and Herman Canamore, Jr., Respondents/Cross-Appellants v. Tishaura Jones, Appellant/Cross-Respondent.
**판결일**: 2014-05-20
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: PER CURIAM.


## 판결문 요약

         In the Missouri Court of Appeals
                 Eastern District
                                            DIVISION FIVE

ERNESTINE RENCHER, Plaintiff, and                      )        No. ED100155
BENJAMIN PHILLIPS, HAROLD                              )
MINOR, DANIEL C. PARSONS AND                           )
HERMAN CANAMORE, JR.,                                  )        Appeal from the Circuit Court
                                                       )        of City of St. Louis
         Respondents/Cross-Appellants,                 )
                                                       )
         vs.                                           )        Hon. Joan L. Moriarty
                                                       )
TISHAURA JONES,                                        )
                                                       )
         Appellant/Cross-Respondent.                   )        Filed: May 20, 2014

Before Robert M. Clayton III, C.J., Robert G. Dowd, Jr., J. and James E. Welsh, Sp.J.

PER CURIAM

         Tishaura Jones, in her capacity as Treasurer of the City of St. Louis

(“Treasurer”) 1 appeals the judgment of the trial court in favor of Daniel Parsons,

Benjamin Phillips, Harold Minor, and Herman Canamore (collectively “Plaintiffs”) on

the liability portion of their petition for declaratory judgment. Plaintiffs cross-appeal the

judgment of the trial court granting summary judgment in favor of Treasurer on the issue

of da...
